attributes.action: sack all MP,s  who have abused the expenses system and report the guilty to the police and  giving all the files available to the authorities to enable prosecution for fraud
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I ask the Prime Minister to sack expose and allow prosecution of MP,s false expences claimes.
If I had fiddled my expences id be sacked.
If I had fiddled my mortgage id be up for fraud !
Its nice to be able to say oh id made a mistake and casually pay the amounts back ONLY IF CAUGHT.and not get sacked , well if these MP,s make so many accounting mistakes that when exposed  (or teased out )always seem to be in their financial favour as opposed to not, they should not even hold office . they should be dealt with as the rest of the British public would be which is severely not sent to the naughty corner for a few days ,It trulybeggars belief.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
